# store(in:)

**Instance Method**

Stores this type-erasing cancellable instance in the specified set.

## Declaration

```swift
final func store(in set: inout Set<AnyCancellable>)
```

## Parameters

- **set**: The set in which to store this [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/AnyCancellable].

## Storing instances

- **store(in:)**: Stores this type-erasing cancellable instance in the specified collection.
